questions.question: What is the predominant color of the text displayed on the product packaging?

What is the most noticeable brand name prominently featured on the packaging?
What specific type of nut is identified as the primary ingredient in the product?
What is the color of the background of the primary label section?
What is the general texture or appearance of the background on the main packaging?
Considering the text, where is the product processed and packed?
What is the descriptive term used for the processing of the canola oil mentioned in the ingredients?
What is the type of sugar mentioned multiple times among the ingredients?
Based on the ingredients, what other potential allergen is noted as potentially present?

What is the general appearance of the text, bold or thin?

What is the state abbreviation indicated on the packaging for the distributor's location?
What is the word indicating a potential additional element found in the product as a cautionary statement?
